title: GOUNOD Arm Sleeves for Men Women,Compression Sleeves to Cover Arms for Men Working,Sun Sleeves for Men UV Protection
description: Sun Protection & Cool:GOUNOD Sun Deflector technology uses dots on the fabric to deflect the sun, so you stay cooler and better protected from harmful UVA and UVB rays.GOUNOD UPF 50 fabric shields against harmful UV rays and act as a sleek, low-profile base layer for comfortable that feels barely there

Superb Tattoo Coverage & Allergy Free:GOUNOD makes cover up sleeves for those who have tattoos. Different companies, schools, and organizations have policies regulating dress. Sometimes this means covering tattoos.And free from harmful chemicals,making them perfect for those with sensitive skin.Recommended by medical experts to maintain healthy skin.Super lightweight and small enough to fit inside of your pocket

Breathable & Fast Dry:Knit-in mesh ventilation helps you shed heat ,Fast sweat kick-away and fast dry, make your skin fresh all day.GUONOD Zero uses sweat to activate cooling, When moisture hits the fabric's surface, the temperature of the fabric drops, creating a cooling sensation
Seamless Comfort & Antiskid:Flatlock seams minimize chafing,The fabric doesn’t shrink and keeps its colour wash after wash. Cuff keep the sleeves on right position and not move

Stretch Fit & Reduce Injuries:GOUNOD design results in near-custom fit and freedom of movement.Our graduated compression Premium Arm Sleeves are designed to increase blood flow and decrease muscle vibration during the throwing motion.essentially keeping everything in place, which over time helps reduce the potential for injuries
